A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The person I feel most sorry for is Mark Hammil.  

He's been a loyal flag bearer for Star Wars\, engaging with the fans\, being upbeat and excited\, long after the other stars became jaded tired of it.  To have to act those scenes\, and make the character that you love do things that they just wouldn't do must have been heart breaking.  

Imagine writing a new Harry Potter book but making Harry is a disloyal coward.  Then have him die at the end and pronounced a failure.  That's what Rian Johnson did with Luke.  

Mark\, if you're out there\, we don't blame you!
